about_text: Kin hill is about kinship and exploring relationship in all itâ€™s dimensions. To ourselves, to each other, to the land and animals and to those yet to come that will call Kin Hill their home.
community_text: We host regular Community Days where you can come along and get involved in the Kin Hill Community. Depending on the season, activities include tree planting, compost turning, fruit picking, apple juicing, and building natural structures.
studio_teaser: Our studio is a light-filled, tranquil space designed for creativity, movement, and gathering. Nestled within the landscape, it offers the perfect environment for facilitators and artists.
workshops_header: We are currently dreaming up a new series of gatherings for the coming seasons.
newsletters_intro: Stay connected with the rhythms of the land and our community through our seasonal updates.
